name: Face the cow
description:
Face the cow is a game I made during the 2018 summer. It is a pretty simple prototype I wanted to work on to try doing a small bullet hell game. The game is pretty hard, the achievements are unfair to unlock, but I'd suggest you to give it a try !

This game can trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Do not play it if you're one of them !
